tool.name: SNP_Butcher
tool.description: This tool subsamples genetic linkage maps
tool.command:
python $__tool_directory__/scripts/snpbutcher2.py \ '$mapFile' '$mafFile' '$genotypesFile' $useHumanGenome $uninformative $zeromaf $nohapmap #if str($spaceDetector.spacingN) == "--spacing": --spacing '$spaceDetector.spacing' #else if str($spaceDetector.spacingN) == "--max": --max '$spaceDetector.max' #else if str($spaceDetector.spacingN) == "--centimorgans": --centimorgans '$spaceDetector.centimorgans' #end if
> '$output'

param.name: zeromaf
param.label: Include Zero Minor Allele Frequency Markers

param.name: spacingN
param.label: Select Markers at Intervals of N, or Specify the Max Number of Markers N, or Select at Intervals of N CentiMorgans
param.option: Select Markers at Intervals of N
Specify the Max Number of Markers N
Select at Intervals of N CentiMorgans

param.name: spacing
param.label: Select Markers at Intervals of N

param.name: max
param.label: Specify the Max Number of Markers N

param.name: centimorgans
param.label: Select at Intervals of N CentiMorgans

tool.help: This tool subsamples genetic linkage maps
